member.name: T:JsonFx.UI.Jbst.JbstCustomControl.EnumerableAdapter
member.summary: A simple adapter for exposing the IEnumerable interface without exposing the IJsonSerializable interface
member.remarks: In order to wrap the output of the JbstControl IJsonSerializable was required, but this takes precedent over the IEnumerable interface which is what should be rendered inside the wrapper.
